SELECT ccheck.*,doctor.name AS doctorName,basicdata.name AS patientName, checkDepartment.checkDepartmentName,checkitem.checkItemName FROM ccheck INNER JOIN doctor ON ccheck.doctorID=doctor.doctorID INNER JOIN patient ON ccheck.patientID=patient.patientID INNER JOIN basicdata ON basicdata.basicID=patient.basicID INNER JOIN checkDepartment ON ccheck.checkDepartmentID=checkDepartment.checkDepartmentID INNER JOIN checkitem ON ccheck.checkItemID=checkitem.checkItemID WHERE ccheck.effectiveNot=1 and checkID=#{checkID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
